channel.title: Standard Collector on Rasta Mouse
channel.description: Recent content in Standard Collector on Rasta Mouse

item.title: Weaponizing Privileged File Writes with Windows Collector Service
item.description: In my previous post, I described how one could leverage CVE-2019-0841 to backdoor the LAPS AdmPwd.dll for EoP to NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM. The obvious question is that if a machine is not using LAPS, what can you do…? Well Rich Warren provided one solution, by using the Windows Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector Service.
